original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī aññatarassa kulassa kulūpikā hoti niccabhattikā.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī aññatarassa kulassa kulūpikā hoti niccabhattikā

original: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena taṁ kulaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho sā bhikkhunī pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena tam kulam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkāmi

original: Tassa kulassa dāsī gharaṁ sammajjantī taṁ āsanaṁ bhājanantarikāya pakkhipi.
analyzed: tassa kulassa dāsī gharam sammajjantī tam āsanam bhājana antarikāya pakkhipi

original: Manussā taṁ āsanaṁ apassantā taṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: manussāḥ tam āsanam a passantāḥ tam bhikkhunim etat avocuḥ
na aham te āvuso āsanam passāmi iti

original: Atha kho te manussā gharaṁ sodhentā taṁ āsanaṁ bhājanantarikāya passitvā taṁ bhikkhuniṁ khamāpetvā niccabhattaṁ paṭṭhapesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho te manussāḥ gharam sodhentā tam āsanam bhājana antarikāya passitvā tam bhikkhunim khamāpetvā niccabhattam paṭṭhapesu

original: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnam etam attham ārocesi

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī purebhattaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkamissatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhunī purebhattam kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkamissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī purebhattaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkamatī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhunī purebhattam kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkamati iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave bhikkhunī purebhattaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkamissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhunī purebhattam kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkamissati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī purebhattaṁ kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkameyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī purebhattam kulāni upasaṅkamitvā āsane nisīditvā sāmike anāpucchā pakkameyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: cattāri kulāni— khattiyakulaṁ, brāhmaṇakulaṁ, vessakulaṁ, suddakulaṁ.
analyzed: cattāri kulāni khattiya kula brāhmaṇa kula vessa kula sudda kula

original: yo tasmiṁ kule manusso viññū taṁ anāpucchā anovassakaṁ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: yaḥ tasmin kule manussaḥ viññū tam an āpucchā anovassakam atikkāmentiyāḥ āpatti pācittiyassa
an āpucchite an āpucchita saññā pakkamati āpatti pācittiyassa
an āpucchite vematikā pakkamati āpatti pācittiyassa
an āpucchite āpucchita saññā pakkamati āpatti pācittiyassa
āpucchite an āpucchita saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
